welcome_message_body: Welcome to Solihull, a charming town known for its historic architecture, beautiful parks, and vibrant shopping and dining scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Solihull has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal of Birmingham Airport mainly serves low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.
